amendment.description: To modify the conditions under which an H-2C nonimmigrant may apply for an employment-based immigrant visa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3965 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 128.

action.text: Amendment SA 3965 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S4680-4683, S4684-4685, S4686-4687) To modify the conditions under which an H-2C nonimmigrant may apply for an employment-based immigrant visa.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3965 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 128.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3965 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 128.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3965 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
